SEARCH
Module org.example.cab302_project
Package org.example.cab302_project

Class ManageRecipesController

java.lang.Object
org.example.cab302_project.ManageRecipesController
public class ManageRecipesController extends Object
Controller Class which handles the logic for managing recipes in the ingredient Tracker application Provides CRUD functionality for the creating,reading, editing, and deleting recipes .

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ManageRecipesController()
    Constructor for managerecipes controller which intializes the RecipeDAO and IngredientsDAO to be able to manage recipe-related and ingredient related database operations

  • Constructor Details

    • ManageRecipesController

      public ManageRecipesController()
      Constructor for managerecipes controller which intializes the RecipeDAO and IngredientsDAO to be able to manage recipe-related and ingredient related database operations

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by loading all recipes and setting up listeners for recipe selection changes. If a recipe is selected, it has its ingredients displayed with appropriate edit and delete buttons enabled

    • handleNewRecipeButtonClick

      public void handleNewRecipeButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handle new recipe button click by opening a new recipe form
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered when the new recipe button is clicked
      Throws:
      IOException - handling of errors with the new recipe view

    • handleEditRecipeClick

      public void handleEditRecipeClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handle edit recipe button click by oopening the edit recipe view, once recipe has been edited, refreshes the recipe list
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the edit recipe button
      Throws:
      IOException - handles errors related to loading the edit recipe view

    • handleDeleteRecipeClick

      public void handleDeleteRecipeClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles deleting a selected recipe by removing it from the database, once deleted, it refreshes the recipe and ingredient lists
      Parameters:
      event - The action event which is triggered when the delete recipe button is clicked.

    • handleAddIngredientClick

      public void handleAddIngredientClick() throws IOException
      Opens a window/view for the addition of a new ingredient to a selected recipe
      Throws:
      IOException - handles errors when loading the new ingredient view

    • refreshIngredients

      public void refreshIngredients()
      Refreshes the ingredient list for the selected recipe

    • backButton

      protected void backButton() throws IOException
      Once clicked, navigates a user back to the main menu
      Throws:
      IOException
